title: 1 Bedroom in Van Nuys - Quartz Counters - SS Appliances - Pool
posting_body: ["Enjoy life's simple pleasures at the Hideaway.", 'Located in the heart of Van Nuys, Hideaway Apartments is ideal for those seeking the ultimate in comfort and convenience.', 'Everything that you need and love is close at hand.', 'We are moments away from the 405 freeway, multiple eateries, and shops.', 'Our modern one and two bedrooms are equipped with stylish stainless steel appliances, hardwood style flooring, recessed lighting, and quartz counters with a custom backsplash.', 'We also offer a welcoming pool and controlled access.', 'Here at the hideaway apartment we offer the modern look you want with the convenience you need.', 'CALL US:', 'show contact info', 'APARTMENT AMENITIES', '- Air Conditioning', '- Ceiling Fans*', '- Dishwasher', '- Disposal', '- Gas Range', '- Microwave', '- Quartz Counters with Custom Backsplash', '- Recessed Lighting', '- Refrigerator', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Washer/Dryer*', '- Wood Inspired Flooring', '* With Select Apartment Homes', 'COMMUNITY AMENITIES', '- Controlled Access/Gated', '- Off Street Parking', '- On-Site Laundry', '- Pool', 'PET POLICY', 'Pets Under 35lbs Welcome with an Additional Deposit.', 'Call for Details and Restrictions.', '15225 Victory Boulevard', 'Van Nuys, CA 91411', 'Square Footage Is Approximate.', 'Price and availability are subject to change.', 'Close to Valley Glen, Lake Balboa, Sherman Oaks, Woodley']
